column4: this is my workaround: use simple scan, it will freeze - force terminate simple scan - un-replug the scanner - start simple scan - ok, calibrates - then use xsane
- thanks, if it looks like i'm running into a problems i'll try that.
some things I use, picked up in this channel http://paste.ubuntu.com/1289542/
phoronix.com has extensive bechmark tests, maybe take a look on that site
